beer.beer_description:
Zlatý Bažant - Distributed in the United States and Canada under the name Golden Pheasant.

Golden Pheasant’s foamy, white head endures as it playfully pops above the beer’s glowing flaxen body. Fresh bread crust scents and grassy, spicy hops culminate in a balanced, classic pilsner aroma. Rich toasted bread flavors rush to the back of the mouth while bitterness pierces through to the tongue. Earthy, spicy hops lend the profile a bit of depth, while smooth cracker malts cascade down the swallow. Wrapping up with toasted notes and a clean, dry finish, this quaffable brew’s as sessionable as they come.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 30 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 15 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 80 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 17!

user.bio: Canadian home brewer and international traveler.

items.comment: I'm surprised to see Zlatý Bažant outside Slovakia and with an English-language label! Is this widely available in Canada?

user.bio: Canadian home brewer and international traveler.

items.comment: Michael F. — this is the first time I’ve seen this beer outside of Europe. It’s brewed by Heineken now, so that probably accounts for its broader availability (?). Still a good Central European beer. be

items.badge_description:
Whether you’re having a room party or hanging at the hotel bar, you know the essential part of any trip, an awesome beer!

That's a beer at 35 different venues categorized as a Hotel! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 8!

user.bio: Bass player/Beat Junkie/ Libation Lover/Outdoor explorer

items.badge_description: Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.
Drinking with friends is fun. Right? You've checked in with at least 4 other people within 2 hours.
So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 1 year on Untappd!

items.badge_description: The power of pilsner! Part of our first round of “Super Style” badges in 2023, celebrate this crisp, clean lager, which ranked as the 10th most checked-in style of 2021 with over 1M check-ins. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 50 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 11.
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 150 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 31!
